original_text: And the houses of Jerusalem, and the houses of the kings of Judah, shall be defiled as the place of Tophet, because of all the houses upon whose roofs they have burned incense unto all the host of heaven, and have poured out drink offerings unto other gods.
korean_text: 예루살렘 집들과 유다 왕들의 집들이 그 집 위에서 하늘의 만상에 분향하고 다른 신들에게 전제를 부음으로 더러워졌은즉 도벳 땅처럼 되리라 하셨다 하라 하시니

sentences.original_text: and houses of kings of Judah
shall be defiled as the place of Tophet
upon whose roofs they have burned incense
unto all the host of heaven
and have poured out drink offerings
